title: Motley Fool Money: 04.19.2013
description: Our analysts discuss earnings news from Google, Microsoft, Chipotle, Intel, Coca-Cola, and Pepsi.  And we talk with Kenneth Cukier, co-author of Big Data:  A Revolution That Will Transform How We Live, Work, and Think.
content:encoded: Our analysts discuss earnings news from Google, Microsoft, Chipotle, Intel, Coca-Cola, and Pepsi.  And we talk with Kenneth Cukier, co-author of Big Data:  A Revolution That Will Transform How We Live, Work, and Think.
